block.title: Slack Alert Action
block.text: Default configuration for the Slack API. (Can be overriden in slackalert.conf)

block.title: Proxy
block.text:
http://proxy_user:proxy_pass@proxy_server:proxy_port
proxy_user, proxy_pass and proxy_port are optional
proxy_user and proxy_pass default to empty
proxy_port defaults to the default port for the protocol (80 for http and 443 for https)

block.title: Server
block.text: In order to obtain the Webhook URL you have to create a new incoming webhook integration for you Slack instance. See Incoming Webhooks Docs for details.

block.title: Token
block.text: This is the default token that will be used if no token is defined for a specific alert.

block.title: Channel
block.text: This is the default channel that will be used to send alerts to.
